comments.r.TextureStreaming: Controls the streaming of textures to optimize performance.
comments.r.MaxAnisotropy: Controls the maximum anisotropy level for texture filtering.
comments.r.MotionBlurQuality: Controls the quality level of motion blur.
comments.r.AmbientOcclusionLevels: Determines the number of levels of ambient occlusion.
comments.r.AmbientOcclusionRadiusScale: Scales the radius of ambient occlusion effects.
comments.r.BloomQuality: Controls the quality of bloom post-processing effects.
comments.r.DepthOfFieldQuality: Controls the quality of depth of field effects.
comments.r.LensFlareQuality: Controls the quality of lens flare effects.
comments.r.SSR.Quality: Controls the quality of screen space reflections.
comments.r.SSR.MaxRoughness: Determines the maximum roughness value for screen space reflections.
comments.r.LightFunctionQuality: Controls the quality of light functions.
comments.r.Shadow.CSM.MaxCascades: Determines the maximum number of cascades for cascaded shadow maps.
comments.r.Shadow.MaxResolution: Sets the maximum resolution for shadow maps.
comments.r.Shadow.RadiusThreshold: Sets the radius threshold for shadow rendering.
comments.r.Shadow.DistanceScale: Scales the distance at which shadows are rendered.
comments.r.TranslucencyLightingVolumeDim: Controls the dimensions of the volume used for translucency lighting calculations.
comments.r.SceneColorFringeQuality: Controls the quality of the scene color fringe effect.
comments.r.Tonemapper.GrainQuantization: Controls the quantization of the tonemapper grain effect.
comments.r.Tonemapper.Quality: Controls the quality of the tonemapper.
comments.r.Streaming.MipBias: Sets a bias for mip level calculations in texture streaming.
comments.r.Streaming.PoolSize: Sets the size of the texture streaming pool.
comments.r.Streaming.LimitPoolSizeToVRAM: Determines whether to limit the texture streaming pool size to the available VRAM.
comments.r.OneFrameThreadLag: Enables or disables one frame of thread lag to improve performance.
comments.r.SkeletalMeshLODBias: Sets a bias for level of detail calculations for skeletal meshes.
comments.r.ViewDistanceScale: Scales the view distance for scene objects.
comments.r.FinishCurrentFrame: Determines whether to finish the current frame before moving on to the next one.
comments.r.UseShaderPredraw: Enables or disables shader predraw to reduce stutter.
comments.r.MinScreenRadiusForLights: Sets the minimum screen radius at which lights are culled.
comments.r.MinScreenRadiusForDepthPrepass: Sets the minimum screen radius at which objects are included in the depth prepass.
comments.r.PrecomputedVisibilityWarning: Enables or disables warnings for precomputed visibility.
comments.r.CustomDepth: Enables or disables custom depth rendering.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.Bloom: Enables or disables the default bloom feature.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.AmbientOcclusion: Enables or disables the default ambient occlusion feature.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.AmbientOcclusionStaticF: Controls the static fraction of the default ambient occlusion.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.AutoExposure: Enables or disables the default auto exposure feature.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.MotionBlur: Enables or disables the default motion blur feature.
comments.r.DefaultFeature.LensFlare: Enables or disables the default lens flare feature.
comments.r.AllowLandscapeShadows: Enables or disables shadows for landscapes.
comments.r.TessellationAdaptivePixelsPerTriangle: Controls the number of pixels per triangle at which tessellation adapts.
comments.r.SSR: Enables or disables screen space reflections.
comments.r.SceneColorFormat: Controls the format of the scene color buffer.
comments.r.DetailMode: Sets the detail mode for the scene rendering.
comments.r.TranslucencyVolumeBlur: Enables or disables blurring of translucency volumes.
comments.r.MaterialQualityLevel: Sets the quality level for materials.
comments.r.EarlyZPass: Enables or disables the early Z pass.
comments.r.EarlyZPassMovable: Enables or disables the early Z pass for movable objects.
comments.r.ClearSceneMethod: Sets the method used to clear the scene.
comments.r.BasePassOutputsVelocity: Controls whether the base pass outputs velocity.
comments.r.StaticMeshLODDistanceScale: Scales the distance at which static mesh LODs switch.
comments.r.PostProcessAAQuality: Controls the quality of post-process anti-aliasing.
comments.r.RenderTargetPoolMin: Sets the minimum size of the render target pool.
comments.r.SceneColorFringe.Max: Sets the maximum scene color fringe.
comments.r.EyeAdaptationQuality: Controls the quality of eye adaptation.
comments.r.FastBlurThreshold: Sets the threshold for fast blur.
comments.r.LightShaftQuality: Controls the quality of light shafts.
comments.r.SSR.Intensity: Controls the intensity of screen space reflections.
comments.r.SSR.ExtraBounce: Enables or disables an extra bounce for screen space reflections.
comments.r.SSS.SampleSet: Sets the sample set for subsurface scattering.
comments.r.SSS.Quality: Controls the quality of subsurface scattering.
comments.r.SSS.HalfRes: Enables or disables half resolution for subsurface scattering.
comments.r.EmitterSpawnRateScale: Scales the spawn rate of particle emitters.
comments.r.ParticleLightQuality: Controls the quality of particle lighting.
